sentence.Network_en: His legs were pitifully thin compared to the rest of his bulk.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的双腿和他庞大身躯的其他部分相比瘦得可怜。

sentence.Network_en: This is fearfully expensive compared with the last one I bought.
sentence.Network_cn: 这和我上次买的相比贵得吓人。

sentence.Network_en: Ferries are very powerful and manoeuvrable compared to cargo ships.
sentence.Network_cn: 与货船相比，渡船马力大而且易操纵。

entry.def: If you say, for  example, that one thing is large or small compared with another or compared to another, you mean that it is larger or smaller than the other thing.

example.ex: The room was light and lofty compared with our Tudor ones...
example.tran: 跟我们都铎风格的房间比起来，这个房间显得素雅而大气。

example.ex: Columbia was a young city compared to venerable Charleston.
example.tran: 与历史悠久的查尔斯顿相比，哥伦比亚是个年轻的城市。

entry.def: You talk about one situation or thing compared with another or compared to another when contrasting the two situations or things.

example.ex: Women are smoking two extra cigarettes a week, compared with four years ago...
example.tran: 与四年前相比， 现在女性每周要多抽两支烟。

example.ex: In 1800 Ireland's population was nine million, compared to Britain's 16 million.
example.tran: 1800年，爱尔兰的人口数为900万，而英国则有1,600万。

Sentence.sentence: Printing with moveable type on paper dramatically reduced the cost of producing a book compared with the old-fashioned ones handwritten on vellum, which comes from sheepskin.
Lisa, our little company, and it is little compared to the giants in the city.
Chris knows that his boss likes Kim's work, and he expects that his work will be compared with hers.
Though the United States has fewer women in the workforce(68percent compared to Sweden's 77 percent).
Compared with early generations we spend more and more time working and have less and less free time to engage in leisure pursues.
Compared with that in America, the status of craft work in Germany is higher.

sentences.en: My salary is chicken feed compared with hers.
sentences.cn: 与她相比, 我的工资少得可怜。

sentences.en: A large number of factories reported sizable increases in output as compared with the previous year.
sentences.cn: 大批工厂都报告说,和前一年相比,产量有很大增长。
